question:
You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.

You would like to participate in a work-related seminar in another country.

Write a letter to the person in charge of the seminar and ask for detailed information regarding the dates, program, accommodation and cost.

You do NOT need to write any address.

You should write at least 150 words.
text: I Miss Victoria from France is willing to participate in the convention on coding held in Canada, Alberta, for which I require a few details for instance when exactly is the workshop like the dates. What are the events that are going to be held?

Furthermore, I have never been to Canada nor do I have any relatives so I have no place to stay. So, the main issue is about the accommodation; if I should book a hotel nearby or it is provided by the forum holders. Consequently, I would also like to know about the hotels nearby if in case they do not provide the stay. In addition, would like to know about the cost of the hotels or if I have to pay any extra charges to the meeting holders.
Requesting you to please send me the required details of the dates, events or the program, accommodation and overall cost in total.
